item.title: Steppenwolf - Born To Be Wild
item.description:
Get your motor running
head out
On the highway
lookin’ for adventure
In whatever
comes our way–
Here and god are
gonna’ make it happen
Take the world
in a love embrace
Fire all of your guns
at once
And explode into space
I like smoke
And lightning
heavy metal thunder
Racin’ with the wind
and the feeling
That I’m under
here and god are
Gonna’ make it happen
take the world
In a love embrance
fire all of your guns
At once and explode
into space
Like a true
nature’s child–
We were born
born to be wild
We can climb so high
I never want to die–
Born to be wild—-
born to be wild—-

Get your motor running
head out
On the highway
lookin’ for adventure
In whatever
comes our way–
Here and god are
gonna’ make it happen
Take the world
in a love embrance
Fire all of your guns
at once
And explode into space
like a true
Nature’s child–
we were born
Born to be wild
we can climb so high
I never want to die–
born to be wild—-
Born to be
wild—-
